description:
Isaac will be heading out to do some rough and tumble stuff half way across the planet, so let's all hope he comes back in in one piece and he lays low.
Just before he left, he came in for the weekend to do a Serviced video and as I mentioned earlier I wanted to see his big 'ole dick in action, so on the next day he got to play with a dude. He did say that once he was drunk once and made out with a guy, but I don't know if that even counts as being "bi"
That video will air in a week or so, and there are some fun surprises.
Meantime, fans of the blowjob get a close up of his amazing dick. It really IS huge. I didn't realize it until I put both hands around it and had a good 2 inches or more still showing.
I should stop being surprised when these guys get into the rimming. Their dicks sure do like it.
Anyway, enjoy this Serviced video of a hot military dude... and look for him in full-action in the coming weeks!
title: Bryan & Isaac - Serviced
